newsArray.title: Virat Kohli Gets A New Look Ahead Of The Boxing Day Test Vs Australia At MCG: Watch
creator: News18
newsArray.description: Australia’s celebrity hairstylist Jordan Tabakman shared a video on Friday evening in which he could be seen giving Kohli a new look ahead of the boxing day Test.

newsArray.title: "Should celebrate, will lift them in series": Ravi Shastri on India
creator: Mid-day
newsArray.description: Ravi Shastri feels that such performances help lift the team and provide a psychological advantage in such a series. He believes that the fight shown in the third Test could be crucial for India in the series ahead. Heading into the Melbourne game, the confidence of the Indian team is clearly visible

newsArray.description: സ​മാ​ന വി​മ​ർ​ശ​നം നേ​രി​ട്ട സൂ​പ്പ​ർ താ​രം വി​രാ​ട് കോ​ഹ്‍ലി പെ​ർ​ത്തി​ലെ ആ​ദ്യ ടെ​സ്റ്റി​ൽ സെ​ഞ്ച്വ​റി കു​റി​ച്ചു​വെ​ന്ന് മാ​ത്ര​മ​ല്ല, അ​ന്ന് ടീം ​ജ​യി​ക്കു​ക​യും ചെ​യ്തു

newsArray.title: 'This could end his career': Michael Clarke on Nathan McSweeney's exclusion from BGT squad
newsArray.description: Michael Clarke came hard on Australian selectors on the exclusion of Nathan McSweeney from the test squad for the remainder of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy. Clarke asked tough questions from the selectors over the exclusion, stating that he should have been given a longer run.

newsArray.title: Shamsher recalls India’s resilience in Paris Olympics quarterfinal after Rohidas red-card
creator: PTI
newsArray.description: Bhubaneswar, Dec. 20 (PTI) Indian hockey star forward Shamsher Singh on Friday recalled how the team displayed unity and determination after defender Amit Rohidas was red-carded in the crucial quarterfinal against Great Britain at the Paris Olympics to return with a successive bronze medal. newsArray.title: SA vs PAK: तीसरे वनडे से बाहर हुआ धाकड़ गेंदबाज, मेजबान टीम की बढ़ी मुश्किलें
newsArray.description: पाकिस्तान के खिलाफ तीसरे वनडे मैच से पहले मेजबान टीम को तगड़ा झटका लगा है। टीम का धाकड़ तेज गेंदबाज सीरीज के आखिरी मैच से बाहर हो गया है।
